import React from 'react'; function LandingPage() { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to StudyVerse

A collaborative platform designed to enhance productivity by scheduling meetings, sharing resources, and staying connected with your study group.

{/* Features Section */}

Study Group Scheduling

Plan and schedule study sessions with your group members. Stay organized and never miss a meeting.

Resource Sharing

Share documents, links, and other study resources to keep everyone on the same page.

Real-time Notifications

Receive notifications about upcoming study sessions and new shared resources directly in your inbox.

{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to boost your productivity?

); } export default LandingPage;
